markdownRemark.html:
In this case, we can try to help you! We need you to send us the following information on our WhatsApp (https://api.whatsapp.com/message/4ZGE273VAQXKP1):

Name of the Secret Santa group Name of the participant who needs the resend Email address of the participant who needs the resend This way, we will try to resend it!

We advise that the application remains installed and that the draw group is not deleted at least until the day of gift exchange.

Awaiting the information.

Happy Secret Santa!

frontmatter.title: DELETED THE APP (BUT DIDN'T DELETE THE GROUP) AND NEEDS TO RECOVER INFORMATION
